original: @#/_/bya rog gi skad brtag par bya ba bzhugs/
analyzed: @#/_/bya rog gi skad brtag par bya ba bzhugs/
translated: The Examination of the Raven’s Call🔽In Sanskrit: Kakajari

original: @#/_/rgya gar skad du/_ka ka dza ri ti/_bod skad du/_bya rog
analyzed: @#/_/rgya gar skad du/_ka ka dza ri ti/_bod skad du/_bya rog
translated: In Tibetan: The Examination of the Raven’s Call

original: gi skad brtag par bya ba 'di lta ste/_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje🔽rigs dang /_dmangs rigs zhes so/_/de la zho la rtshi ba bram ze'o/_/mig
analyzed: gi skad brtag par bya ba 'di lta ste/_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje rigs dang /_dmangs rigs zhes so/_/de la zho la rtshi ba bram ze'o/_/mig
translated: This is as follows: The brahmin, the royal class, the ruling class, and the commoner.

original: dmar ba rgyal rigs so/_/gshog pa sprugs pa rje rigs so/_/nya'i gzugs
analyzed: dmar ba rgyal rigs so/_/gshog pa sprugs pa rje rigs so/_/nya'i gzugs
translated: The brahmin is one who eats curd; the royal class is one with red eyes; the ruling class is one who flaps its wings; and the commoner is one that has the form of a fish.

original: lta bu rmangs rigs so/_/mi gtshang ba za ba dang /_sha 'dod pa yang de
analyzed: lta bu rmangs rigs so/_/mi gtshang ba za ba dang /_sha 'dod pa yang de
translated: One who eats unclean things and desires meat is also like that.

original: bzhin no/_/'di dag gi skad kyi rnam 'gyur ni/_/khyim bdag gis cig car🔽bden par 'gyur ba ni brjod par bya ste/_thun dang po la  shar du bya rog skad
analyzed: bzhin no/_/'di dag gi skad kyi rnam 'gyur ni/_/khyim bdag gis cig car bden par 'gyur ba ni brjod par bya ste/_thun dang po la  shar du bya rog skad
translated: The householder should speak the truth about the various calls of these birds:

original: sgrogs na sems can gyi 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/me ru bya rog skad
analyzed: sgrogs na sems can gyi 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/me ru bya rog skad
translated: If the raven calls in the east during the first watch, the desires of beings will be fulfilled.🔽If the raven calls in the south, enemies will come.

original: sgrogs na dgra 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/lho ru bya rog skad sgrogs na grogs po 'ong
analyzed: sgrogs na dgra 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/lho ru bya rog skad sgrogs na grogs po 'ong

translated: there will be an unexpected gain.🔽If a crow caws in the west,🔽a great wind will arise.🔽If a crow caws in the northwest,

translated: one will find lost wealth.🔽If a crow caws in the northeast,🔽a woman will arrive.🔽If a crow caws in the nadir,

analyzed: pa'i gnas su bya rog skad sgrogs na 'gron po 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/thun

analyzed: bden bral du bya rog skad sgrogs na rgyud pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/nub tu skad

translated: hear good news. If it caws in the northeast, a quarrel will come. If it

analyzed: bar 'gyur ro/_/tshhangs pa'i gnas su skad sgrogs na 'dod pa'i 'jug pa rnyed
translated: caws in the zenith, one will find the entrance to the desired [treasure].

analyzed: par 'gyur ro/_/thun gnyis pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs so//_//
translated: The second watch is complete.

translated: If it cries in the west, a woman will come.🔽If it cries in the direction of the wind, someone nearby will come.🔽If it cries in the north, a good friend will come.

analyzed: po 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang ldan du skad sgrogs na mes 'tshhig par 'gyur ro/_/

analyzed: bya rog gi skad brtag par bya ba bzhugs/

analyzed: tshhangs pa'i gnas su skad sgrogs na rgyal pos thugs la brtags pa'i rnyed pa thob
translated: If it cries in the east, you will obtain what the king has in mind.

original: par 'gyur ro/_/thun gsum pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs so//
analyzed: par 'gyur ro/_/thun gsum pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs so//
translated: The third watch is complete.

original: thun bzhi pa la shar du bya rog skad sgrogs na 'jigs pa che ba'i rtags so/_/
analyzed: thun bzhi pa la shar du bya rog skad sgrogs na 'jigs pa che ba'i rtags so/_/
translated: In the fourth watch, if a crow cries in the east, it is a sign of great fear.

original: me ru skad sgrogs na rnyed pa che ba'i rtags so/_/lho ru skad sgrogs na 'gron po
analyzed: me ru skad sgrogs na rnyed pa che ba'i rtags so/_/lho ru skad sgrogs na 'gron po
translated: If it cries in the southeast, it is a sign of great gain.🔽If it cries in the south, a guest will come.

original: 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/bden bral du skad sgrogs na zhag bdun du rlung po 'byung
analyzed: 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/bden bral du skad sgrogs na zhag bdun du rlung po 'byung
translated: If it cries in the southwest, there will be wind for seven days.

original: bar 'gyur ro/_/nub tu skad sgrogs na rlung po'i char 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/
analyzed: bar 'gyur ro/_/nub tu skad sgrogs na rlung po'i char 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/
translated: If it cries in the west, there will be a wind and rain.

original: rlung gi mtshhams su skad sgrogs na nor gtor ba rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/byang du bya🔽rog skad sgrogs na rgyal po 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang ldan du skad sgrogs na go
analyzed: rlung gi mtshhams su skad sgrogs na nor gtor ba rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/byang du bya rog skad sgrogs na rgyal po 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang ldan du skad sgrogs na go
translated: If it cries in the direction of the wind, one will find lost wealth.🔽If it cries in the north, the king will come.🔽If it cries in the northeast, one will find a garment.

original: la rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/tshhangs pa'i gnas su bya rog skad sgrogs na ltogs pa'i
analyzed: la rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/tshhangs pa'i gnas su bya rog skad sgrogs na ltogs pa'i
translated: If it cries in the abode of Indra, it is a sign of hunger.

original: rtags so/_/thun phyed dang bzhi'i 'khor lo rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: rtags so/_/thun phyed dang bzhi'i 'khor lo rdzogs so//_//
translated: The wheel of the four half-watches is complete.

original: nyi ma nub pa'i tshhe shar du bya rog skad sgrogs na lam du dgra 'ong bar
analyzed: nyi ma nub pa'i tshhe shar du bya rog skad sgrogs na lam du dgra 'ong bar
translated: If a crow cries in the east at sunset, an enemy will come on the road.🔽If it cries in the south, there will be a treasure.

original: 'gyur ro/_/me ru sgra sgrogs na gter 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/lho ru sgra sgrogs na nad
analyzed: 'gyur ro/_/me ru sgra sgrogs na gter 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/lho ru sgra sgrogs na nad
translated: If it cries in the south, one will die from illness.

original: kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/srin po'i mtshhams su sgra sgrogs na sems kyi 'dod pa
analyzed: kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/srin po'i mtshhams su sgra sgrogs na sems kyi 'dod pa
translated: If it cries in the direction of the rākṣasas, one will accomplish the desires of the mind.

original: 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/nub tu bya rog skad sgrogs na nye ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/
analyzed: 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/nub tu bya rog skad sgrogs na nye ba 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/
translated: If a crow cries in the west, a friend will come.

original: rlung gi mtshhams su skad sgrogs na nor rnyed pa'i rtags so/_/byang du skad sgrogs
analyzed: rlung gi mtshhams su skad sgrogs na nor rnyed pa'i rtags so/_/byang du skad sgrogs
translated: If it cries in the direction of the wind, it is a sign of finding wealth.

original: na rgyal po la bkur sti 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/tshhangs pa'i gnas su skad sgrogs na
analyzed: na rgyal po la bkur sti 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/tshhangs pa'i gnas su skad sgrogs na
translated: If it cries in the north, one will receive honor from the king.🔽If it cries in the direction of Brahma, one will obtain the wealth one desires.

original: bsams pa'i rnyed pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/thun bzhi pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs so/_/
analyzed: bsams pa'i rnyed pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/thun bzhi pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs so/_/
translated: The wheel of the fourth period is complete.

original: 'di lta bu'i bya rog gi skad kyi rnam 'gyur rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i bya rog gi skad kyi rnam 'gyur rdzogs so//_//
translated: This concludes the various cries of the crow.

original: da ni 'gro ba'i mtshhan nyid brjod par bya ste/_/'gro ba'i dus su bya rog
analyzed: da ni 'gro ba'i mtshhan nyid brjod par bya ste/_/'gro ba'i dus su bya rog
translated: Now, the characteristics of the movements of people should be described.🔽At the time of movement, the characteristics of the crow’s🔽voice should be described.

original: gi skad kyi mtshhan nyid brjod par bya ste/_/rags dang chu'i 'gram dag la/_/
analyzed: gi skad kyi mtshhan nyid brjod par bya ste/_/rags dang chu'i 'gram dag la/_/
translated: If it cries to the left of a riverbank,🔽and likewise to the left of a tree,

original: shing gcig la ni de bzhin du/_/_grogs stod dang ni lam bzhi la/_/g.yas
analyzed: shing gcig la ni de bzhin du/_/_grogs stod dang ni lam bzhi la/_/g.yas
translated: to the left of a friend, and to the left of a crossroads,🔽if the crow cries to the left,🔽one should know that this movement is good.

original: su bya rog sgra sgrogs na/_/'gro ba 'di ni legs par shes/_/lam la rab tu
analyzed: su bya rog sgra sgrogs na/_/'gro ba 'di ni legs par shes/_/lam la rab tu
translated: If one is traveling on the road🔽and the crow cries behind one,

original: 'gro ba'i tshhe/_/rgyab tu bya rog sgra sgrogs na/_/dngos grub rab tu thob par
analyzed: 'gro ba'i tshhe/_/rgyab tu bya rog sgra sgrogs na/_/dngos grub rab tu thob par
translated: one will obtain supreme spiritual power.

original: 'gyur/_/lam du 'gro ba'i tshhe gshog pa sprug cing skad 'don na/_/bar chad
analyzed: 'gyur/_/lam du 'gro ba'i tshhe gshog pa sprug cing skad 'don na/_/bar chad
translated: If you flap your wings and cry out while on the road,

analyzed: chen po 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/lam du zhugs pa'i tshhe skra mchus gzings shing sgra
translated: great obstacles will come.🔽If you cry out while on the road,

analyzed: sgrogs na de'i tshhe 'chi ba'i rtags so/_/lam du zhugs pa'i tshhe mi gtshang ba za

analyzed: zhing sgra sgrogs na bza' dang skom 'ong ba'i rtags so/_/lam du zhugs pa'i tshhe tshher

analyzed: de'i tshhe sdod sa bzang po rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gdan la gnas nas sgra sgrogs na

analyzed: bya rog gi skad brtag par bya ba bzhugs/

analyzed: nor rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/lam du zhugs pa'i tshhe sgra sgrogs na 'dod pa 'grub par

analyzed: yal ga la tshhang byed par gyur na/_de'i tshhe lo bzang ba dang char 'ong bar 'gyur

analyzed: 'gyur ro/_/shing gi dbus kyi yal ga la tshhang byed na de'i tshhe 'jigs pa chen po

analyzed: 'gyur ro/_/rtshig pa'am sa'am chu la tshhang byed na rgyal po 'tshho bar 'gyur ro/_/

analyzed: gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/_ka ka zhes bya rog skad sgrogs na nor rnyed par

original: 'gyur ro/_/nga nga zhes bya rog skad sgrogs na sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
analyzed: 'gyur ro/_/nga nga zhes bya rog skad sgrogs na sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
translated: If it caws “nga nga,” suffering will arise.🔽If it caws “tata,” you will find clothing.

original: ta ta zhes skad sgrogs na gos rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/g+ha b+ha zhes skad sgrogs na
analyzed: ta ta zhes skad sgrogs na gos rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/g+ha b+ha zhes skad sgrogs na
translated: If it caws “ghava,”🔽your aims will be accomplished.

original: don 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/g+ha ga zhes bya rog skad sgrogs na nor 'ong bar
analyzed: don 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/g+ha ga zhes bya rog skad sgrogs na nor 'ong bar
translated: If a crow caws “ghagha,” wealth will come.

original: 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa'i rtags mthong na bya rog la gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/_/
analyzed: 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa'i rtags mthong na bya rog la gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/_/
translated: If you see an omen of fear, make an offering to the crow.

original: sbal pa'i sha bya rog dga' bar byed pas/_des gtor ma phul na bar chad med
analyzed: sbal pa'i sha bya rog dga' bar byed pas/_des gtor ma phul na bar chad med
translated: Since crow meat delights crows, if you offer it as a torma, obstacles will be eliminated.

original: par 'gyur ro/_/o mi ri mi ri badzra tu da de gi lo gri gri gi gri swa ha/_'di lta
analyzed: par 'gyur ro/_/o mi ri mi ri badzra tu da de gi lo gri gri gi gri swa ha/_'di lta
translated: “ Oṃ mirī mirī vajra tud tāḍaya gṛhṇa gṛha gṛha gṛha svāhā”

original: bu'i bya rog gi spyod pa rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: bu'i bya rog gi spyod pa rdzogs so//_//
translated: The conduct of the crow is complete in this way.🔽The great paṇḍita Dānaśīla

original: pan+di ta chen po da na shi las/_yul dbus kyi yar klungs thang po che'i
analyzed: pan+di ta chen po da na shi las/_yul dbus kyi yar klungs thang po che'i
translated: in the great Yarlung Valley of Central Tibet

original: gtshug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//_//pi ri pritsh+tsha /
analyzed: gtshug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//_//pi ri pritsh+tsha /
translated: and the temple.
